name: innards-out

effect.scarlet-violet: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.

effect.the-indigo-disk: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.
